plot outline: Mohan is a simple yet exceptionally gifted man who works in the village hospital. But when he finds himself being ignored because of his less-than-average looks, he decides to get a makeover. This film revolves around him and his villagers and also highlight the human tendency of giving more importance to the shallow side of life like fame and fortune as opposed to basic humanity.
title: Asa Mi Tasa Mi
plot: Mohan is a simple yet exceptionally gifted man who works in the village hospital. But when he finds himself being ignored because of his less-than-average looks, he decides to get a makeover. This film revolves around him and his villagers and also highlight the human tendency of giving more importance to the shallow side of life like fame and fortune as opposed to basic humanity.

Mohan is a gifted man to his village who takes care of the village government hospital which has no doctors since many years many a times he treats the patient himself by knowing whatever knowledge he took from the earlier doctors. He extracts money from fraud people and uses the same for betterment of hospital patients in order to run the hospital .A team of doctors arrive in the hospital including Dr Swetha and Dr Rahul ,Mohan gets smitten by her beauty and provides her all necessary help but lacks behind due to his looks Swetha returns back without informing Mohan which leaves him depressed.One night hospital catches fire and Mohan gets stuck inside trying to save a child the family of the child takes Mohan to the city without his families knowledge as his burns are severe after a surgery Mohan gets a new face and and also meets Swetha he wants to return back home but circumstances don't allow him to go.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
